allow: Bash(gh repo create faker_agent --private --description "A multi-modal agent system that uses LLMs to create fake personas for security testing" --source=. --push)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add CLAUDE.md with development guidance for Claude Code

This file provides comprehensive guidance for Claude Code when working with this repository, including:
- Project overview and architecture
- Common development commands
- Key configuration files
- Development patterns and extension points
- API integration details

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(git add backend/config/settings.py backend/core/executor/base_executor.py backend/core/planner/base_planner.py backend/.env.example CLAUDE.md)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add support for custom LiteLLM endpoint URL

- Added LITELLM_BASE_URL setting to support custom LiteLLM endpoints
- Updated BasePlanner and BaseExecutor to use custom endpoint if configured
- Updated .env.example with LITELLM_BASE_URL configuration option
- Updated CLAUDE.md documentation to reflect new configuration option

This enables users to configure LiteLLM to work with custom proxy endpoints
or alternative LLM providers that are compatible with the OpenAI API format.

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(python -c "
from backend.core.filters.filter_manager import filter_manager
print(''Available strategies:'')
for name, strategy in filter_manager.strategies.items():
    print(f''  {name}: {strategy}'')
")

Bash(python -c "
from backend.api.agent_routes import router as agent_router
print(''Agent router:'', agent_router)
print(''Routes in agent router:'')
for route in agent_router.routes:
    print(f''  {route.methods} {route.path} -> {route.name}'')
")
